rules.natural: If the drug is patented, then the plant is cultivated.
Either the drug is patented or the drug is generic.

Under the condition that the tool is in research phase, if it is not the case that the game is regulated or (if the drug is generic then either the game is banned or the game is not approved), then the game is marketed.
If the plant has quality control, then the manufacturing is profitable.
Whenever the plant has a safety check, the manufacturing is profitable.
Provided that the plant is certified, the plant has quality control.
The plant is certified or the plant is inspected.
If the drug is banned, then the drug is approved.
If the tool is licensed, then the plant is registered.
Either the tool is licensed or the tool is unlicensed.
Whenever the tool is unlicensed, the tool is experimental.
Under the condition that the tool is experimental, if the plant is inspected, then the plant has a safety check.
Either the tool is tested or the tool is untested.
Provided that the tool is untested, it is not the case that the drug is approved.
Whenever it is not the case that if the tool is tested, then the drug is not approved, the legislation is compliant.
Under the condition that it is not the case that if the tool is tested, then the drug is not approved, it is not the case that the legislation is compliant.
Provided that it is not the case that if the manufacturing is not profitable, then the plant is not approved, the drug is banned.
If the manufacturing is not profitable, then the plant is approved.
Whenever the manufacturing is not profitable, the game is approved.

facts.natural: The tool is in research phase.
It is not the case that the game is regulated.
It is not the case that the game is marketed.
It is not the case that the plant is cultivated.

steps.natural: If the tool is tested, then it is not the case that the drug is approved.
It is not the case that the drug is banned.
Under the condition that the manufacturing is not profitable, it is not the case that the plant is approved.
If it is not the case that the game is regulated or (if the drug is generic then either the game is banned or the game is not approved), then the game is marketed.
The game is regulated, or, whenever the drug is generic, either the game is banned or the game is not approved.
Provided that the drug is generic, either the game is banned or it is not the case that the game is approved.
The plant is cultivated, or the game is banned, or the game is not approved.
Either the game is banned or the game is not approved.
It is not the case that the game is approved.
Provided that the tool is unlicensed, if the plant is inspected, then the plant has a safety check.
The plant is registered, or, if the plant is inspected, then the plant has a safety check.
Under the condition that the plant is inspected, the plant has a safety check.
Either the plant has quality control or the plant has a safety check.

natural_facts.A14: The tool is in research phase.
natural_facts.A16: The plant has a safety check.

(A10 → A9).natural: If the drug is patented, then the plant is cultivated.

(A10 ∨ A11).natural: Either the drug is patented or the drug is generic.

(A11 → (A8 ∨ ¬A7)).natural: Provided that the drug is generic, either the game is banned or it is not the case that the game is approved.

(A12 ∨ (A11 → (A8 ∨ ¬A7))).natural: The game is regulated, or, whenever the drug is generic, either the game is banned or the game is not approved.

(A14 → (¬(A12 ∨ (A11 → (A8 ∨ ¬A7))) → A1.natural: Under the condition that the tool is in research phase, if it is not the case that the game is regulated or (if the drug is generic then either the game is banned or the game is not approved), then the game is marketed.

(A15 → G).natural: If the plant has quality control, then the manufacturing is profitable.

(A15 ∨ A16).natural: Either the plant has quality control or the plant has a safety check.

(A16 → G).natural: Whenever the plant has a safety check, the manufacturing is profitable.

(A17 → A15).natural: Provided that the plant is certified, the plant has quality control.

(A17 ∨ A18).natural: The plant is certified or the plant is inspected.

(A18 → A16).natural: Under the condition that the plant is inspected, the plant has a safety check.

(A19 ∨ (A18 → A16)).natural: The plant is registered, or, if the plant is inspected, then the plant has a safety check.

(A2 → A3).natural: If the drug is banned, then the drug is approved.

(A20 → A19).natural: If the tool is licensed, then the plant is registered.

(A20 ∨ A21).natural: Either the tool is licensed or the tool is unlicensed.

(A21 → (A18 → A16)).natural: Provided that the tool is unlicensed, if the plant is inspected, then the plant has a safety check.

(A21 → A22).natural: Whenever the tool is unlicensed, the tool is experimental.

(A22 → (A18 → A16)).natural: Under the condition that the tool is experimental, if the plant is inspected, then the plant has a safety check.

(A4 → ¬A3).natural: If the tool is tested, then it is not the case that the drug is approved.

(A4 ∨ A5).natural: Either the tool is tested or the tool is untested.

(A5 → ¬A3).natural: Provided that the tool is untested, it is not the case that the drug is approved.

(A8 ∨ ¬A7).natural: Either the game is banned or the game is not approved.

(A9 ∨ (A8 ∨ ¬A7)).natural: The plant is cultivated, or the game is banned, or the game is not approved.

(¬(A12 ∨ (A11 → (A8 ∨ ¬A7))) → A13).natural: If it is not the case that the game is regulated or (if the drug is generic then either the game is banned or the game is not approved), then the game is marketed.

(¬(A4 → ¬A3) → A6).natural: Whenever it is not the case that if the tool is tested, then the drug is not approved, the legislation is compliant.

(¬(A4 → ¬A3) → ¬A6).natural: Under the condition that it is not the case that if the tool is tested, then the drug is not approved, it is not the case that the legislation is compliant.

(¬(¬G → ¬A1) → A2).natural: Provided that it is not the case that if the manufacturing is not profitable, then the plant is not approved, the drug is banned.

(¬G → A1).natural: If the manufacturing is not profitable, then the plant is approved.

(¬G → A7).natural: Whenever the manufacturing is not profitable, the game is approved.

(¬G → ¬A1).natural: Under the condition that the manufacturing is not profitable, it is not the case that the plant is approved.

A14.natural: The tool is in research phase.

¬A12.natural: It is not the case that the game is regulated.

¬A13.natural: It is not the case that the game is marketed.

¬A2.natural: It is not the case that the drug is banned.

¬A7.natural: It is not the case that the game is approved.

¬A9.natural: It is not the case that the plant is cultivated.
